search_results.query: alicia keys brand new me lyrics

snippet.title: Are you ready for some marketing?: How sports became product placement for music
snippet.description:
Are you ready for some marketing?: How sports became product placement for music by Seth Matlins on Feb 1 2013, 11:52a
I wasn’t there so I can’t swear to it. Still, I’m pretty sure that as the lions circled their prey in the Coliseum, a Roman emperor, maybe Nero, had someone playing lute, banging a drum or...
